protein.specific_function: JNK1 isoforms display different binding patterns:beta-1 preferentially binds to c-Jun, whereas alpha-1, alpha-2, and beta- 2 have a similar low level of binding to both c-Jun or ATF2. However, there is no correlation between binding and phosphorylation, which is achieved at about the same efficiency by all isoforms

go_class.description: receptor signaling protein serine/threonine kinase activity
